name: EscapeTheWeb
description:
A short roguelike where you play as your mouse. You must click on the viruses to destroy them. But be careful, every click you make takes away 0.5 of your Hp. You also have your Rightclick power, but it takes away one from your maxHp. 

Destroy all the viruses and free yourself from the WEB!

ps:

green guys can be dragged and dropped

Blue Boss: hit their head.

(forgot who did the music though....my bad
